DOC.brief_summary: This study is evaluating the safety and efficacy of a 12 week treatment LDV/SOF FDC in patients with Chronic GT1 or GT4 HCV infection and autoimmune disease
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Ledipasvir/Sofosbuvir Fixed-Dose Combination for 12 Weeks in Subjects With Chronic Genotype 1 and 4 HCV Infection With Autoimmune Disease
DOC.criteria: Chronic GT1 or GT4 HCV Infection Diagnosed with autoimmune disease (rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, lupus, etc.) and is currently receiving treatment for the condition. Infection with HIV or HBV
